title: Abyssal demon

properties.name: description
properties.value: Abyssal demons are one of the strongest types of demons, requiring level 85 Slayer to be damaged. Alongside their boss variant, they are the only creatures in the game to drop the abyssal whip and abyssal dagger.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Abyssal demon
This article is about the Slayer monster. For the boss, see Abyssal Sire. For the superior variant, see Greater abyssal demon.
 This article has a Slayer task guide here.
Information comparing locations for Slayer tasks will be on this page

Abyssal demons are one of the strongest types of demons, requiring level 85 Slayer to be damaged. Alongside their boss variant, they are the only creatures in the game to drop the abyssal whip and abyssal dagger.

In combat, abyssal demons are capable of teleporting either themselves or the player around, meaning that safespotting is not possible. When teleported, you will stop attacking the demon. Having Auto Retaliate turned on can help make sure you fight back. They have relatively high accuracy but their max hit of 8 is low for their combat level.

Being a demon, this creature is affected by demonbane weapons.

Drops[edit | edit source]

Drop rates estimated based on 1,142,066 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average Abyssal demon kill is worth 8,248.86.

The average Abyssal demon kill while on a Konar task is worth 9,740.76.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 June 2021
(update | poll)

Abyssal demons now drop abyssal ashes in place of regular ashes.

30 June 2016
(update | poll)

Abyssal Demons have had the abyssal dagger added to their drop table with a drop rate of 1/32k.

28 April 2016
(update | poll)

More Abyssal demon spawns have been added to the Slayer Tower.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The iconic weapon dropped by the abyssal demon, the abyssal whip, is the spine of the creature.
  • A silhouette of an abyssal demon appears on the floor by the Monks of Zamorak in Taverley Dungeon.
